job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Engineer Python - AI Agents - SaaS
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Backend Developer, you will be instrumental in scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform. You'll design and build high-performance, distributed backend systems that seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows. Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists, you'll develop cloud-native services, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and enhance system security and reliability.

   This role offers an exciting opportunity to shape the future of AI-powered customer service in a fast-paced, venture-backed startup.

   Responsibilities:
     * Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs.
     * Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices.
     * Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments.
     * Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation.
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer Python - AI Agents - SaaS

As a Backend Developer, you will be instrumental in scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform. You'll design and build high-performance, distributed backend systems that seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows. Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists, you'll develop cloud-native services, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and enhance system security and reliability.

   This role offers an exciting opportunity to shape the future of AI-powered customer service in a fast-paced, venture-backed startup.

   Responsibilities:
     * Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs.
     * Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices.
     * Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments.
     * Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on building backend services that integrate AI models into customer workflows, developing cloud-native services, and streamlining CI/CD pipelines. This aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile's emphasis on developing and deploying applications built on generative models and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems.

job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'Develop and optimize scalable backend services', 'cloud-based infrastructure', and 'REST APIs' directly relate to building and integrating software systems.
The description mentions 'streamline CI/CD pipelines', 'optimizing deployments', and 'monitoring systems', which are core components of MLOps.

The role involves integrating 'AI models into customer workflows' and working 'closely with machine learning engineers', indicating involvement in the application of models, even if not directly building them from scratch.
The mention of 'AI automation platform', 'customer workflows', and 'AI-powered customer service' shows an understanding of the business context and application of AI.

soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists' and 'working with the CTO and engineering team' implies collaboration.
The mention of 'shape the future of AI-powered customer service' and 'drive innovation' suggests a proactive and ownership-oriented approach.
The responsibilities of 'scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform' and 'Ensure performance and reliability' point to problem-solving and a pragmatic approach.
The context of a 'fast-paced, venture-backed startup' and a rapidly evolving field like AI implies a need for continuous learning and adaptability.
